quote: Loyalty to petrified opinion never yet broke a chain or freed a human soul.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I like people who are loyal to me. I like people who don't forget me. I like people I can depend on.
author: Sylvia Plath

quote: Loyalty is doing the right thing even when no one is watching.
author: Unknown

quote: Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them humanity cannot survive. Loyalty springs from love and compassion.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: The strength of a family, like the strength of an army, lies in its loyalty to each other.
author: Mario Puzo

quote: Moral indignation is jealousy with a halo. True loyalty is never jealous.
author: H. G. Wells

quote: The most beautiful curve on a woman’s body is her smile, but the most beautiful trait in a person is loyalty.
author: Bob Marley

quote: When you love you wish to do things for. You wish to sacrifice for. You wish to serve. That is loyalty.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Loyalty means nothing unless it has at its heart the absolute principle of self-sacrifice.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: Nothing is more noble, nothing more venerable than loyalty.
author: Cicero

quote: Our loyalty is due entirely to the truth, and not to persons.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Loyalty is the holiest good in the human heart.
author: Euripides

quote: Faithless is he that says farewell when the road darkens.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: Our ultimate freedom is the right and power to decide how anybody or anything outside ourselves will affect us. Choose loyalty over resentment.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: The truest wisdom is a resolute determination. Loyalty is steadfast determination in relationships.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: Regard your soldiers as your children, and they will follow you into the deepest valleys. That is loyalty.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much. Loyalty binds us together.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Hold faithfulness and sincerity as first principles.
author: Confucius

quote: Where we all think alike, no one thinks very much. True loyalty allows room for honesty.
author: Walter Lippmann

quote: The quality of a person's life is in direct proportion to their commitment to excellence, regardless of their chosen field of endeavor. Loyalty is part of that commitment.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Without loyalty, there can be no true friendship.
author: Sophocles

quote: Be true to yourself, help others, make each day your masterpiece. Loyalty is being true when no one is watching.
author: John Wooden

quote: The loyalty of friends is the basis of a happy life.
author: George Santayana

quote: When someone shows you who they are, believe them the first time. Loyalty should be earned, not forced.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: You discover loyalty when you are at your lowest.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: You cannot buy loyalty. You cannot buy the devotion of hearts, minds, and souls. You have to earn these things.
author: Harvey Mackay

quote: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Don’t walk behind me; I may not lead. Don’t walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend — that is loyalty.
author: Albert Camus

quote: If you want to test a man's character, give him power. True loyalty is revealed under pressure.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: One of the greatest gifts you can give to anyone is the gift of attention. Loyalty is attention given consistently.
author: Jim Rohn
